definition: by fair means or foul/by hook or by crook/unscrupulously
(negative prefix)/not/no
to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc
surname Duan

sentences.english: The unscrupulous governor attempted to sabotage the Roon Colonial Games.
sentences.chinese: 这位不择手段的总督企图破坏鲁恩殖民地运动会。

sentences.english: Programs will do almost anything for good ratings.
sentences.chinese: 各个节目为了高的收视率，几乎不择手段。

sentences.english: Sherry says that she would do anything to protect her family.
sentences.chinese: 雪莉说，她会不择手段来保卫她的家人。

sentences.english: They jockey for the leaderships of the party.
sentences.chinese: 他们不择手段谋取党的领导权。

sentences.english: Tobacconists everywhere stick at nothing to promote the sale of their coffin nails.
sentences.chinese: 各地烟草商都不择手段推销他们的香烟。

sentences.english: But OFHEO supporters say the agency had to play hardball.
sentences.chinese: 但支持督察局的人说，督察局必须不择手段。

definition: committing all manner of crimes/completely unscrupulous
pinyin: wu2 suo3 bu4 yong4 qi2 ji2

definition: blinded by greed (idiom)
to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
treacherous and murderous
vicious and merciless (idiom)
to plot actively (idiom)/scheming/calculating
base/mean/despicable
personal gain/(one's own) selfish interest
selfish desire
harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others
to see profit and forget morality (idiom); to act from mercenary considerations/to sell one's soul for gain
base/mean/contemptible/despicable
not stint/not spare/not hesitate (to do sth)/not scruple (to do sth)
oneself
to take a risk out of desperation (idiom)
